description:
A groundbreaking and insightful new course for writers looking to MAXIMIZE PRODUCTIVITY, BOOST CREATIVITY, and GET MORE DONE IN LESS TIME!

"This is life-changing stuff...I highly recommend this course to even the most seasoned of writers." - ROBIN, UDEMY STUDENT

"This class is terrific. Anyone who faces a keyboard every morning should take it!" - EMMY, UDEMY STUDENT

"This is a game changer." - REBEKAH UDEMY STUDENT

"I'm feeling inspired and motivated instantly." - MIRIAM, UDEMY STUDENT


HOW WOULD YOU FEEL IF YOU COULD:

  • Write twice as much as you do now...in half the time?
  • Get into the "writing zone" effortlessly every single day?
  • Feel inspired to write every time you sit down?
  • Easily meet all of your writing deadlines?
  • Write more books per year? 


I used to struggle to stay focused and productive every day. But after years of researching and experimenting with all different kinds of productivity strategies, techniques and tools, I’ve managed to curate an extensive list of “hacks” that have helped me become a more productive writer. 

How productive? 

LAST YEAR, I WROTE 4 NOVELS (over 350,000 words) AND A SCREENPLAY...

IN LESS THAN 12 MONTHS!

When I tell people this, they usually say something like...

"How do you find the time???"

But in actuality, it's not about the amount of writing time you have, it's how you use that time. 

I WRITE 4+ BOOKS A YEAR...WRITING ONLY 2-3 HOURS A DAY!

In this course, I teach you how to minimize the time you put in, while maximizing what you get out, so you can get the most out of every writing day. 

My name is Jessica Brody and I’m an international bestselling author published by several major publishers like Simon and Schuster, Random House, Macmillan, and Disney Press. I’ve been writing professionally for over 10 years and here’s what I’ve discovered about the creative process:

Our brains are like computers. They can do amazing things but they can also get bogged down by all the various programs we open during the day. With all these other programs eating up RAM in our brains, we barely have any processing power left to do what we writers love to do: write!

Which is why I developed this course: to teach you my tried and true strategies, tips, tools, and techniques for eliminating distractions, freeing up brain processing power, and focusing your attention and energy on what’s most important, so you can get more done, in less time. 

I call these strategies: PRODUCTIVITY HACKS. Because similar to how our brain functions like a computer, we can also hack it like a computer. We can apply simple yet effective tricks to BOOST BRAIN FUNCTION, INCREASE FOCUS, BE MORE INSPIRED, and WRITE MORE!

Check out the course outline for more detail about what you’ll learn plus take a look at some of the free previews which include information that you can use to get started right away.  

I hope to see you inside the course!

"My productivity and focus has vastly increased even in a short period of time." - LESLIE, UDEMY STUDENT

"Superb." - KIMBERLELY, UDEMY STUDENT

"Gave me all the materials and motivation to complete my novel." - MICHAEL, UDEMY STUDENT

"I love, love, love all the ideas and hacks I learned in this course. First day I implemented these hacks, I got 2K words! I recommend this class 100%!" - YAMILE, UDEMY STUDENT

"Your course is very inspiring..." - JULIA, UDEMY STUDENT

"I have learned so much information that has helped me in the writing process." - CHRISTY, UDEMY STUDENT

"Good pacing, great tools, wonderful ideas... loving this course!" - REGINA, UDEMY STUDENT

"Love the videos. Very easy to understand and lots of great tips!" - LISA, UDEMY STUDENT


REVIEWS FROM JESSICA'S OTHER UDEMY COURSES:

"Jessica Brody has a gift for distilling lots of hard-earned information into concise and tasty bites. - KATHERINE, UDEMY STUDENT

"Jessica is a marvelous teacher and I like how she gets to the point and keeps it moving." -  KATHYE, UDEMY STUDENT

"Jessica Brody very generously shares her secrets in this fantastic course." - JAYNE, UDEMY STUDENT

"A definite must for anyone wishing to break into the big leagues!!"  - JESSICA, UDEMY STUDENT

Loving it. Really useful and clearly presented! - TIFFANY, UDEMY STUDENT 

"Very informative and well worth the time and cost" - NOEL, UDEMY STUDENT

"If you're stuck for an idea, not just an idea but a great idea, then this class is for you."  - STEVE, UDEMY STUDENT

"Jessica Brody breaks down these concepts with clarity and amazing insight."  - MIKE, UDEMY STUDENT

"Her brainstorming section is awesome..."  - STEVE, UDEMY STUDENT

"Short and sweet but highly useful."  - ZURI, UDEMY STUDENT 

"Gave me some great ways to go back and figure out what's not working..." - MICHELLE,  UDEMY STUDENT
title: Writing Mastery: Productivity Hacks for Writers
